item.description:
Fix App Not Checking For Updates Automatically

Rainaissance will now check for updates automatically if you toggle on "Automatically check for updates" in the "Updates" section of the settings. The setting was there earlier, but Rainaissance did not actually check for updates automatically.

Previously...

Rainaissance v1.1.3 - Fix Multiple Monitor Connect/Disconnect Issues

This update resolves an issue where Rainaissance would create multiple instances of itself when connecting/disconnecting from external monitors quickly.
